document.full_text: iran marked "nuclear technology day" on saturday by saying it had improved the equipment used to enrich uranium -- the process which many western countries fear iran is using to try to produce a nuclear bomb.
document.title: iran says atomic progress resumes after power plant delay
lines_and_colors: iran marked "nuclear technology day" on saturday by saying it had improved the equipment used to enrich uranium -- the process which many western countries fear iran is using to try to produce a nuclear bomb.
